alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah; Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:58PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Garfield and north central Kane Counties through 130 PM MDT... At 1257 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Henrieville, or 36 miles northeast of Kanab, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henrieville and Kodachrome Basin State Park. This includes Utah Route 12 between mile markers 27 and 32, and between mile markers 34 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
